review: Nicest little hipower box you can get for customizing Android. Can't build one with these features this cheap. You need to look over the inputs and such, the processing power and the memory. Do not let me tell you, see for yourself and do a little reading. The box is also hackable - by YOU - easily and then you can return it to factory default if it gets screwed up by simply going to the menu and telling it to reset - wipes out all your mods and returns to the way it was delivered. Nice. Now that Amazon has added the ability to do other things like out of the box storage options [external usb hard drive for more space or usb flash card in a software update, it is obvious they are committed to improving it and not simply letting it die on your shelf the way it was the day you bought it. I bought this one for a friend, they loved my setup.
